name: Stranded! Hair Simulator
description:
Stranded! Hair Simulator

After learning how to draw, many people have either really liked or really disliked the way I draw hair.  I'm very excited to announce that I'm making exclusively hair-related content from now on! 

Welcome to the Stranded! Hair simulator. Are you having a bad day? A good one? Enter your mood into the simulator and your Hair-um will react accordingly!

Features:

  • Over three emotions to choose from!
  • Over 24 conversations to be had!
  • Choose from either Ginger, the Tsund-hair-e or Harry, the Childhood Strand!
  • Lots of hair puns
  • Happy April Fools!

Credits:

Backgrounds:

public domain pictures
wikimedia

Music: 

Night at the Dance Hall - Twin musicom

Font:

Alpha Woman Hair font by Claude at FontRiver.com

WARNING + IMPORTANT:

This was actually going to be a real story-driven game but my cat got sick and I wasn't able to work on it at all. I made this in legitimately an hour so forgive the sloppiness / laziness as I get back to my actual projects haha. This game is heavily untested and unedited lol as I said, made in 1 hour. Good luck to those who dare to open it.
